item.title: Antilag server restarter
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

That antilag is no good. It doesn’t stop the lag of the server it only restarts the .bat file but doesn’t end the process. I suggest using Anime’s restarter because that one is not good.

Read full topic
